basic.description: This course is the second of a two-semester sequence on the design of biomedical engineering processes and products.  The second term focuses on the actual design of a biomedical engineering process or product using computer-aided design calculations.  This is the capstone senior design course in biomedical engineering.  An individual design project is completed by each student.
basic.subject: BME
basic.title: Biomedical Engineering Process Design II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BCH 4053, BME 4403C, and BME 4801. Corequisite: Senior standing.
